name: sns2hipchat
description: Simple AWS/SNS HTTP{S} endpoint relay to HipChat

HIPCHAT_TOKEN.description: The API auth token for your HipChat account, REQUIRED

HIPCHAT_ROOM.description: The HipChat room to send messages to, REQUIRED

HIPCHAT_FORMAT.description: The HipChat message format, defaults to html

HIPCHAT_FROM.description: The HipChat sender messages come from, defaults to 'Amazon SNS'

HIPCHAT_NOTIFY.description: Tell HipChat to notify people on sending messages, defaults to false

HIPCHAT_COLOR.description: The HipChat message color, default to yellow

HIPCHAT_HOST.description: The HipChat target host, defaults to api.hipchat.com

HIPCHAT_API_VERSION.description: The HipChat API Version, default v1

DEBUG.description: Verbose logging for debugging SNS and hipchat errors
